channel.title: CVE Feed for Johnson Controls -- Metasys
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Johnson Controls -- Metasys

item.title: CVE-2021-36205|2024-08-04T00:54:50.703Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Under certain circumstances the session token is not cleared on logout.

item.title: CVE-2021-36202|2024-08-04T00:54:50.839Z -- johnson%20controls -- metasys
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Johnson Controls Metasys could allow an authenticated attacker to inject malicious code into the MUI PDF export feature. This issue affects: Johnson Controls Metasys All 10 versions versions prior to 10.1.5; All 11 versions versions prior to 11.0.2.
